name: Relax Puzzle
description: Relax Puzzle is a simple puzzle game that will help you take a break from a hard day. The game is very simple, as it was created for your relaxation and does not require special attention. The game has 15 levels, where each level consists of 16 elements that must be rotated in the desired direction and dragged into place. At the beginning of the level, you see the image for 5 seconds and then it disappears. In this version of the game, the help button is disabled, as it was in previous games, since the levels are very simple. The game will help you relax and have fun. There is a choice of levels and you can start playing from the level you choose. The game will delight you with nice graphics and calm music.
